chinese: 我最喜欢的天气, 我想一年中最好的时候是秋天,
english: The kinds of weather that I like best, I think the best time a year is the fall,

chinese: 一年中的这个季节空气清新, 凉爽, 感觉更干净.
english: that time a year where the air is crisp and cool and it seems to be cleaner.

chinese: 春天是我最喜欢的季节.
english: Spring is my favourite kind of weather.

chinese: 我喜欢现在这样的天气, 今天好极了.
english: I like this weather. Today is a perfect day.

chinese: 不是太热, 也不是太冷, 可以在户外活动.
english: Not too hot, not too cool, you can do things outside.

chinese: 不幸的是, 我们住在Washington D.C, 那里有两种天气: 坏天气和热天气.
english: We live, unfortunately, in Washington D. C. which has sort of two weathers: bad and hot.

chinese: 冬天并不像真正的冬天, 而夏天却非常非常炎热.
english: Winter, a little bit of winter but not really, and then mostly very, very hot summer.

chinese: 我喜欢这儿的秋天, 过去几年的秋天真是不错.
english: I love the autumn here, and actually the past couple of years we've been having really nice falls.

chinese: 我通常会看天气频道.
english: I usually watch the weather channel.

chinese: 报纸上有, 新闻中也有. 对, 新闻和天气频道.
english: The paper. On the news. Yes, news, weather channel.

chinese: 我喜欢看天气预报, 他们在播天气预报时还同时展示全国地图.
english: I like to watch them when they give you the weather report showing the map of the whole country

chinese: 你能看到天气系统和天气在变化.
english: and you can then see the weather systems, weather moving.

chinese: 我看看报纸, 然后看看外面的天, 比较一下谁预报更准.
english: I look at the newspaper and then l look outside and see, er, which, which is a better predictor.

chinese: 有个查询天气的免费电话, 拨通电话后有天气预报的录音, 我每天都要打两三次.
english: There's a free weather, er, phone number that you can call for like a recorded weather forecast and I call probably two or three times a day.

chinese: 是真的. 我得知道穿什么衣服, you know.
english: I do. I have to know what to wear, you know.

chinese: 天气说变就变, 天气预报怎么说并不起多大作用.
english: It changes so quickly that it doesn't really matter what the weather forecasts say.

chinese: 如果我一早起来要去工作, 天在下雨, 那, 这种天气会使我情绪有点儿低落.
english: If I wake up in the morning needing to go to work and it's raining, that, kind of dampens my spirits a little bit.

chinese: 我想如果早晨空气清新凉爽, 阳光明媚, 你就会感到轻松愉快, 兴高采烈.
english: I think if it's a nice, crisp, cool morning, the sun is shining, you feel, you feel bright and cheery yourself.

chinese: 阳光使人精力充沛.
english: The sun is very energizing.

chinese: 我不能住在总是下雨或阴冷的地方.
english: I couldn't live somewhere where it's rainy or cold all the time.

chinese: 在Washington又热又湿时, 我们什么都不想做,
english: When it's hot and humid in Washington, we don't want to do anything and,

chinese: you know, 昨天下雨, you know, 天阴沉沉的, 每个人心情都不好.
english: you know, I think yesterday was a really rainy, you know, overcast day, everybody was a little down.

chinese: 今天天好了, 我们又都振作了起来.
english: Today it's beautiful, so we're all up again.
